amendment.description: To increase amounts for the rail and transit security programs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Amendment SA 4553 ruled out of order by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 4553 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 194.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 4553.
Amendment SA 4553 proposed by Senator Biden. (consideration: CR S7377-7381, S7382-7384, S7387; text: CR S7377) To increase amounts for the rail and transit security programs, and for other purposes.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 4553 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 50 - 50. Record Vote Number: 194.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4553 proposed by Senator Biden.
